when it's red, it means that the message is highlighted by your xchat. By default, it will highlight if somebody mentions your nickname. That is why I prefix comments to you with your name, so you will be able to read comments easily. Many other clients are like this. In a popular channel like here, it is a good idea to prefix comments with the nickname of the person you're talking to.

nickname completion worked, but you had to manually set highlighting to your nickname. With xchat it's like that by default. And, autocompletion suffixes a character (in your case, ",", in my case, ":") and then a space
